p: For the treatment of some tropical diseases, medicinal plants have been shown to be a viable source in the search for new alternatives ( 31). Thus, this study showed that the essential oil obtained from the fruits of P. tuberculatum Jacq., had good antiparasitic potential, corroborating some data already described in the literature and that probably the major compounds are responsible for the observed effect. Nevertheless, it is necessary further testing in order to elucidate its mechanism of action.
